name: Airflow BashOperator 最小
description: BashOperator を使った最小 DAG

files.template:
from airflow import DAG
from airflow.operators.bash import BashOperator
from datetime import datetime
with DAG('bash_example', start_date=datetime(2024,1,1), schedule=None, catchup=False) as dag:
    BashOperator(task_id='echo', bash_command='echo hello')
